allow:
Bash(do curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/v1/events/message -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'x-user-id: test-real-user' -H 'x-internal-service: gateway' -d '{
      userId: test-real-user,
      threadId: test-realthread-$(date +%s),
      msgId: msg-$i,
      role: user,
      content: I prefer using React with TypeScript for all my frontend projects. It gives me better type safety.,
      tokens: {input: 20, output: 0},
      timestamp: $(date +%s)000
    }' echo 'Sent message $i' sleep 0.2 done echo 'Done - checking metrics...' sleep 2 curl -s http://localhost:3001/v1/metrics)
